article_title: Kenya’s Budget Tries to Bolster Security Against Terrorism
article_text:
NAIROBI, Kenya—This East African nation unveiled its biggest budget ever on Thursday, led by a funding increase for security forces to battle Islamic militants who have staged repeated attacks on the region’s biggest economy.

Kenya will spend $21.5 billion in the fiscal year through June 2016, a 10th of it to buy equipment and hire security personnel to bolster forces stretched thin by repeated attacks by al-Shabaab, which is linked...
